title: Rotate the four chairs to face toward the table

requirements.text: Update the 3D cafe scene so that all four chairs placed around the single table are rotated to face toward the table at position [0, 0, 2], in both the full environment and the fallback environment.

quotes: Fix the direction of the 4 chairs they should be facing towards the table

acceptanceCriteria: In CafeEnvironment, the two chairs positioned at z=1.3 (in front of the table) are rotated to face +Z (toward the table), and the two chairs positioned at z=2.7 (behind the table) are rotated to face -Z (toward the table).
In BasicCafeRoomFallback, the chair rotations match the full environment so all four chairs face toward the table.
Visual check: when viewing the scene, each chairâ€™s backrest is oriented away from the table and the seat opening faces the table.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Repositioning the table or chairs (only fix chair direction/rotation).
Changing chair geometry/materials/textures or adding new furniture.
